zotero-better-bibtex
zotero-better-bibtex

Change Log

Change Log

1.6.79 (2016-10-25)

Full Changelog

Implemented enhancements:

  • Setting the item type via the “cheater syntax” #587

Fixed bugs:

  • “null translator” in webserver export #586
  • Error in automatic export #585
  • Missing items in right-click menu #584
  • [JavaScript Error: “TypeError: collection.getChildItems is not a function” {file: “chrome://zotero/content/xpcom/translation/translate_item.js” line: 763}] #579
  • Error exporting #576

Closed issues:

  • Fields do not “refresh” in Zotero 5.0-beta.r67+3f5ead (only “Citation Key” field) #588
  • Better BibTeX silently updates within a version of Juris-M it no longer supports? #582

1.6.78 (2016-10-20)

Full Changelog

Fixed bugs:

  • Problem exporting Library #578
  • better bibtex disabled on ZSA #575

1.6.77 (2016-10-17)

Full Changelog

1.6.76 (2016-10-17)

Full Changelog

Implemented enhancements:

  • Add a Quick Copy Gitbook mode #574
  • Support asciidoctor-bibtex format #567
  • Biblatex extended name format #566
  • titles are title-cased in .bib file; titleCase pref not present #558
  • veryshorttitle and compound words #551

Fixed bugs:

  • Braces around author last name when exporting BibTeX #565
  • Title case of latex greek text on biblatex export #564

Closed issues:

  • CSL status → biblatex pubstate #573
  • Default-language assumption for references that have no language set #571

Merged pull requests:

  • Update Do not caps-protect name fields #384.noopsort.bibtex #570 (nickbart1980)
  • Update Do not caps-protect name fields #384.bibtex #569 (nickbart1980)
  • Update Do not caps-protect name fields #384.noopsort.bibtex #568 (nickbart1980)
